text:
The NOTICE file in Tomcat trunk (and 7.x and 6.x) uses the wrong wording.

The 4th line should say [1][2]:

This product includes software developed at

however it actually says:

This product includes software developed by

which is not the same thing.

[Note that AL 1.0 and 1.1 did use the "developed by" wording; maybe that is the origin of the problem.]

[1] http://www.apache.org/legal/src-headers.html#notice
[2] http://www.apache.org/dev/release.html#notice-require
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
Fixed in trunk and 7.0.x and will be included in 8.0.0-RC6 and 7.0.47 onwards.
Moving to Tomcat 6.

Regards
Violeta
creator: violetagg@apache.org

text:
Fixed in Tomcat Native trunk and 1.1.x.

Tomcat Connectors (mod_jk) already use the correct text.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
